Education

  • BS in Science, Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics, China, 2007-2011.
  • Ph.D in Computer Science, Southeast University, China, 2011-2016.
  • Postdoc in Computer Science, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore, 2016-2017.

Rewards

  • 2017, The Distinguished Dissertation Award of AAMAS in China (2017智能体与多智能体系统优秀博士论文奖)
  • 2017, The Distinguished Dissertation Award at Southeast University (东南大学优秀博士学位论文)
  • 2014, Best Student Paper Award of ICTAI 2014(ICTAI 2014 最佳学生论文奖)
